title: Tasty Varutharacha Nattu Kozhi Curry Recipe
content:
The super delicious chicken curry which is not only easy to make but is so yummy. This taste amazing with some rice or roti.

This is a simple chicken curry made using fresh spices and ground coconut. This chicken dish is so easy to make, you need basic ingredients. If you use small chicken pieces then it will be tastier.

 

Varutharacha Chicken Curry Recipe

Prep time: 10 mins

Cook time: 45 mins

Total time: 55 mins

 

Recipe type: Main

Cuisine: Indian

Serves: 4 servings

 

Ingredients

Nattu kozhi / Country chicken - 1 kg

Onion - 3 large sliced thinly

Coconut Oil - 4 tablespoon

Fennel seeds / Sombu / Saunf - 2 tsp

Bay Leaf - 1

Cardamom / Yelakai - 4

Cloves / Krambu - 4

Cinnamon / Pattai - 1 stick

Ginger Garlic Paste - 2 tablespoon

Tomatoes - 4 large chopped finely

Chilli powder - 1 tablespoon

Coriander Powder - 2 tablespoon

Turmeric powder - 1 teaspoon

Cumin powder - 2 teaspoon

Garam Masala Powder - 1 tablespoon

Potato - 2 large peeled and cubed

Salt to taste

 

FOR ROASTING:

Oil - 1 tsp

Dry Red Chillies - 6

Coriander Seeds / Malli - 2 tablespoon

Coconut - 1 cup

 

Instructions

Take chicken in a pressure cooker, add salt and turmeric powder and pressure cook for 5 to 6 whistle. Turn off the heat and let it sit till steam escapes.

Heat oil in a pan, add coriander seeds and chillies and saute till toasted.

Add coconut and saute till it gets golden.

Take it in a blender and make it into a smooth paste.

Heat oil in a pan, add whole spices and let them sizzle.

Add ginger-garlic paste and saute for a min.

Add onions and cook till golden.

Add in tomatoes and cook till mushy.

Add spice powders and salt and mix well.

Add in cooked chicken and mix well.

Add ground masala, salt and mix well.

Cook till oil separates.

Serve it.
